component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.activity.ActivityStreamService
component.documentation:
Service storing and querying activities.
@author Thomas Roger (troger@nuxeo.com)

extension-point.name: activityStreamFilters
extension-point.documentation:
ActivityStreamFilters are used to store and filter activities for specific use cases.
The ActivityStreamService delegates to the contributed filters.

extension-point.name: activityVerbs
extension-point.documentation: An ActivityVerb stores the configuration for a given verb: - a label key - an icon path

extension-point.name: activityLinkBuilders
extension-point.documentation: An ActivityLinkBuilder is used to compute the different links and URLs (for a document, an user, ...) that can be in an Activity message.

extension-point.name: activityStreams
extension-point.documentation:
An ActivityStream stores the information about a given stream (user activity stream, a social workspace activity stream, etc).
It contains:
a name;
a list of Activity verbs related to the stream.
documentCreated documentModified circle

extension-point.name: activityUpgraders
extension-point.documentation: An ActivityUpgrader is launched after the repository initialization to do some upgrades if needed on the already existing Activities.
